resources.string: Shri H. H. J. B. Polytechnic Chandvad

Vision:
To enhance technical skills of students to meet industry needs along with human values. 

Mission:
M1- To provide industry-oriented quality technical education to face industrial challenges. 
M2- To inculcate professional skills and human values among students. 
M3- To develop entrepreneurial qualities among students and motivate them towards lifelong learning.

The motto of science department is to imbibe the spirit of scientific temper and to instill the logical and analytical approach to the budding engineers. It also lays a foundation in the students required for the present engineering and technology core. This department â€˜s main objective is to develop in the student, the attitude to imbibe advanced concepts applied in various fields of engineering as well as to apply new concepts to the existing emerging challenges. This department has highly qualified and experienced staff who always focus for the development of the students. They are involved in all departmental activities either curricular or extra curricular. The Academic work of First Year is taken care by Department of Science. It also maintains Parent-Institution communication of First Year. This department deals with the subjects like Basic Sciences, Applied Sciences (Physics, Chemistry), English, Mathematics and Communication skills.
